def test_smoke():
        driver = webdriver.Chrome()
        driver.get("https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/")
        print(f"Текущий URL: {driver.current_url}")
        print(f"Размер окна: {driver.get_window_size()}")
    
        assert driver.title == "OrangeHRM"
        print("OrangeHRM сайт открылся")
    
        wait = WebDriverWait(driver, 10)
    
        username_field = wait.until(
            EC.presence_of_element_located((By.NAME,"username"))
        )
        userpassword_field = wait.until(
            EC.presence_of_element_located((By.NAME, "password"))
        )
    
        assert username_field.is_displayed()
        assert driver.find_element(By.NAME, "password").is_displayed()
        print("поля ввода отображаются")
    
        username_field.send_keys("Admin")
        userpassword_field.send_keys("admin123")
        print("Данные введены")
    
        login_button = wait.until(
>           EC.element_to_be_clickable(By.CSS_SELECTOR, "button[type='submit']")
        )
E       TypeError: element_to_be_clickable() takes 1 positional argument but 2 were given
